message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11,000.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $11,000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand that $11,000 is a bit above your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10,500. Let me know what you think.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit. However, $10,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm ready to pay $9,800.  I believe this is a fair price for both of us.

Hi Bob, I understand that $10,500 is still a bit above your budget, but I'm willing to make another adjustment. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10,200. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $10,200 is still more than I'm comfortable paying.  I'm willing to go up to $9,900. This is my final offer. Let me know if you're willing to accept.

Hi Bob, I understand that $9,900 is a good offer, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for that price. I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10,000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
